document_data.name: Waterdhavian Cheese
document_data.mainbody: '''Waterdhavian cheese''' was pale with holes and came from [[Waterdeep]],
document_data.Geography: The [[cheese]] was available in most bars in the city and was also commonly eaten by the nobility.
document_data.Description: It had a sharp and tangy bite.
document_data.Prices: As of [[1368 DR]], a {{SIAdj|1|lb}} wheel was around four silver pieces, and a {{SIAdj|100|lb|k}} was available for around 35 [[gold piece]]s.
